/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on exercising the right of pension election, including
applicability of a Veteran’s exercise of the right of election
action to take when an election is not in a claimant’s best interest
, and
an example of deferring an election until a future beneficial effective date
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section C - Elections Between Pension Programs
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section C
